title: Mahama Gov't Must Honour Its Debt Obligation To Utility Providers - Kabila
text: James Kwabena Bomfeh of the Convention People's Party ( CPP ) has charged Government to defray its cost to utility providers in the country. According to him, Ghanaians are experiencing perennial power cuts because of the failure of the
